気がない: (きがない) - to be uninterested; indifferent/listless
気がふれる: (きがふれる) - to go mad; to go crazy; to lose one's mind
気がめいる: (きがめいる) - to feel depressed; to be down
気がもめる: (きがもめる) - to feel anxious; to feel uneasy; to worry
気が付く: (きがつく) - to notice/to become aware/to perceive/to realize/to realise; to be scrupulous/to be attentive; to recover consciousness/to come to oneself
気が付くと: (きがつくと) - before I knew it; next thing you know; when I came to
気が利く: (きがきく) - to be sensible/to be smart/to be tasteful; to be thoughtful/to be tactful/to be sensitive
気が動転する: (きがどうてんする) - to be upset; to lose one's head (through shock); to be frightened to death
気が勝つ: (きがかつ) - to be determined or strong-willed
気が合う: (きがあう) - to get along (with someone)
気が向かない: (きがむかない) - not inclined (to do); reluctant; unwilling
気が向く: (きがむく) - to feel like; to feel inclined to do
気が咎める: (きがとがめる) - to feel guilty; to suffer from a guilty conscience; to feel uneasy; to have qualms about; to have scruples about; to feel regret
気が回らない: (きがまわらない) - (ant: 気が回る) not getting around to (as far as) considering
気が回る: (きがまわる) - to be attentive to small details; to be attentive to others (or others' concerns); to have one's mind turn groundlessly to something negative
気が変: (きがへん) - insane; mad; crazy; light in the head
気が変になる: (きがへんになる) - to go crazy; to lose one's mind
気が変わる: (きがかわる) - to change one's mind
気が小さい: (きがちいさい) - timid; faint-hearted; wimpish
気が差す: (きがさす) - to feel uneasy; to worry (about something)
気が引ける: (きがひける) - to feel awkward; to feel shy
気が弱い: (きがよわい) - timid; faint of heart
気が張る: (きがはる) - to strain every nerve; to feel nervous
気が強い: (きがつよい) - strong-willed; strong of heart
気が強くなる: (きがつよくなる) - to feel more confident
気が急く: (きがせく) - to feel under pressure; to feel impatient; to be in a hurry
気が抜ける: (きがぬける) - to feel exhausted (after having been stressed)/to feel spent/to feel relieved (from stress); to become stale (i.e. of a carbonated beverage)/to go flat/to lose flavor/to lose flavour
気が揉める: (きがもめる) - to feel anxious; to feel uneasy; to worry
気が散る: (きがちる) - to get distracted; to jump off the track
気が晴れる: (きがはれる) - to feel refreshed; to feel more cheerful; to feel better
気が楽: (きがらく) - feeling good; feeling at ease; feeling easy
気が気じゃない: (きがきじゃない) - feel uneasy; on tenterhooks; in suspense
気が気でない: (きがきでない) - feel uneasy; on tenterhooks; in suspense
気が済まない: (きがすまない) - not to be able to settle down (if something is not done); must (do something)
気が済む: (きがすむ) - to be satisfied; to feel good
気が滅入る: (きがめいる) - to feel depressed; to be down
気が無い: (きがない) - to be uninterested; indifferent/listless
気が狂う: (きがくるう) - to go mad; to go crazy
気が知れない: (きがしれない) - unable to understand (reason, motive, etc.)
気が短い: (きがみじかい) - quick-tempered; having little patience; impatient
気が立つ: (きがたつ) - to be excited about; to get all worked up about
気が紛れる: (きがまぎれる) - to be diverted (distracted) from
気が緩む: (きがゆるむ) - to relax one's mind/to feel relaxed; to become remiss/to cease paying careful attention
気が置かれる: (きがおかれる) - to feel constraint/to feel uneasy; to worry
気が置けない: (きがおけない) - easy to get on with; not needing reserve or formality; personable; affable; approachable
気が腐る: (きがくさる) - to feel dispirited; to feel discouraged
気が触れる: (きがふれる) - to go mad; to go crazy; to lose one's mind
気が詰まる: (きがつまる) - to feel constrained; to feel ill at ease
気が転倒する: (きがてんとうする) - to be upset; to be flurried; to be frightened (out of one's wits)
気が進まない: (きがすすまない) - reluctant to; not inclined to; disinclined; unwilling
気が進む: (きがすすむ) - to be inclined to do; to be willing to do
気が違う: (きがちがう) - to be mad; to go mad; to go insane
気が遠くなる: (きがとおくなる) - to faint/to lose consciousness; to feel overwhelmed/to be astounded
気が重い: (きがおもい) - depressed; bummed out; down; heavy-hearted; heavy-spirited; feeling reluctant (to do)
気が長い: (きがながい) - patient; having a long fuse
気さえする: (きさえする) - (more emphatic than 気がする) to have a certain mood or feeling; to have a hunch
気さく: (きさく) - friendly; openhearted; sociable; amiable; good-humored; good-humoured; frank; candid; willing; ready
気つけ薬: (きつけぐすり) - restorative; smelling salts
気づかう: (きづかう) - to worry about; to feel anxious about; to have apprehensions of
気づかれ: (きづかれ) - mental fatigue; worry; boredom
気づかわしい: (きづかわしい) - anxiously; with anxious looks; with anxiety
気づく: (きづく) - to notice; to recognize; to recognise; to become aware of; to perceive; to realize; to realise
気で気を病む: (きできをやむ) - to worry without reason; to fret
気どる: (きどる) - to affect; to put on airs
気にいる: (きにいる) - to be pleased with; to suit
気にかかる: (きにかかる) - to weigh on one's mind; to be worried about (something)
気にかける: (きにかける) - to weigh on one's mind; to trouble one's heart; to be concerned about; to worry about
気にくわない: (きにくわない) - unable to stomach; sticking in one's throat
気にさわる: (きにさわる) - to hurt one's feelings; to rub someone the wrong way
気にしない: (きにしない) - not caring; not giving a damn
気にしないで: (きにしないで) - don't worry about it; forget about it
気にする: (きにする) - to mind (negative nuance); to care about; to worry; to pay undue (amount of) attention to (something)
気にするな: (きにするな) - Never mind!; Don't worry about it
気にとめる: (きにとめる) - to (keep in) mind; to give heed to; to pay attention to
気になる: (きになる) - to be on one's mind/to worry one/to care about/to be bothered by/to feel uneasy/to be anxious; to feel inclined; to fancy/to like/to catch one's eye
気になれない: (きになれない) - (after a verb) don't feel like doing; can't bring oneself to do; can't face
気にもしない: (きにもしない) - not care; not caring
気にもとめない: (きにもとめない) - to pay no heed to; to not care about; to take no notice of
気にも留めない: (きにもとめない) - to pay no heed to; to not care about; to take no notice of
気に入る: (きにいる) - to be pleased with; to suit
気に召す: (きにめす) - to like; to prefer; to be pleased by
気に喰わない: (きにくわない) - unable to stomach; sticking in one's throat
気に掛かる: (きにかかる) - to weigh on one's mind; to be worried about (something)
